bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Identical with kuang quan 狂犬 , rabid dog. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 19: 雄黃為末，醋調塗， 仍用酒服。凡為蛇傷及蜂蠆、蜈蚣、毒蟲、顛犬所傷，皆可用 , “A powder prepared from xiong huang can be externally applied mixed with vinegar, and it can be taken internally together with wine. It can be used for all injuries caused by snakes, bees, scorpions, centipedes, poisonous bugs/worms, as well as rabid dogs ”.
